body: Ive noticed on maps where there are apples and gold blocks, you could get an enchanted gapple. just wanted to know if that is a legitimate strategy or the map creators just forgot about it. Thanks!
body_tagged: Ive noticed on maps where there are apples and gold blocks, you could get an enchanted gapple. just wanted to know if that is a legitimate strategy or the map creators just forgot about it. Thanks!
title: Is Notch apple Legit?

replies.body:
I remember I made a notch apple in OCN once.
I was OP for a few seconds until the regen wore off and I realised I was in a 10v1 xD

replies.body:
You don't need OP apples to bow spam!!

OP: Yes it's done on purpose.
